elements.text:
You and your friends are out getting dinner. Your food and drinks arrive, and you accidentally spill your drink down the front of your new white shirt.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: I think about how this is a common accident.
I feel like I'm annoying to my friends right now, but they will understand that accidents happen.
I think about how it will be a funny story.
I feel like I'm causing a scene, but the other people here don't know me or care about this situation.
I think I will look silly in front of everyone.
